survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants of professional certification programs to understand their satisfaction, the program's impact on their career, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for easier navigation if the list of certifications is long.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice dropdown with an 'Other' option triggering a text input.

script.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall quality of the certification program?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture comprehensive feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an 'Other' option triggering a text input.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How has the certification impacted your career?
answer_options: Significant positive impact (e.g., promotion, salary increase)
Moderate positive impact (e.g., new opportunities, skill recognition)
questions.client_notes: Include an open-ended follow-up for 'Negative impact' to gather detailed feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with conditional text input for 'Negative impact'.

script.question_text: How has the certification impacted your career?
answer_options: Significant positive impact (e.g., promotion, salary increase)
Moderate positive impact (e.g., new opportunities, skill recognition)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Encourage detailed responses by providing a large text box.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the certification program?
